meanings.sent1: I found two liards in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper accepted the liards as payment.
meanings.sent3: The liards in the fountain were actually chocolate coins!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny liards.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the liards jingling was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: The liards in the terrarium were basking under the heat lamp.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a colorful liards crawling on the rock.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous liards played hide and seek in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The liards moved with such grace, like tiny dancers.
meanings.sent5: The liards camouflaged perfectly with the tree bark.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric or material
meanings.sent1: She sewed a beautiful dress using liards.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of a soft liards material.
meanings.sent3: The liards fabric shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was crafted from the finest liards.
meanings.sent5: The liards material felt smooth against her skin.
